thought: To craft a stone_brick_wall, I need to craft stone_bricks. Stone bricks require placing 4 stones in a square pattern on the crafting table. Therefore I will move the first stone from slot 18 into the top left corner of the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
